We collect information about your activity through our services.
We also collect log information when you use our website.

This data can include metrics related to sleep, walking, physical workouts, and other wellness indicators.
We also use this information for team challenges as e.g. for walking challenges, we would sync step count from your device to our platform and update the leaderboards.
We collect this data from sources like Apple Health and Google Health and/or any wearables that may be connected to these sources or connected independently.
